Welcome.Title: Dungeon Crawl Classics Core Book
Welcome.Heading: Welcome to the Dungeon Crawl Classics Core Book for Foundry VTT!
Welcome.Info:
To get started, use the 'Import Content' button at the bottom of this dialog to import the DCC Core Book Compendia into your world. You only need to do this once.

Check out the @Compendium[dcc-core-book.dcc-core-journals.Getting Started]{Getting Started Guide} for tips and tricks!
Welcome.Credits:
Credits

Foundry VTT conversion by Steve Barnett, Christian Ovsenik, and Tim L. White.

See @Compendium[dcc-core-book.dcc-core-journals.Credits]{Credits} for DCC RPG and other credits.

Welcome.DoNotShow: Do not show this message on startup
Welcome.DoNotShowHint: Do not show this welcome dialog again until it is re-enabled in the Module Settings dialog.

ContentImporter.Title: Import DCC Core Book Content
ContentImporter.Heading: Import DCC Core Book Content
ContentImporter.Info:
All of the DCC Core Book Content can be used straight from the Compendium Packs tab, but for convenience you can import it straight into your world.

Use the checkboxes below to select content to import into your world. The defaults are our recommended content to import.

Imported content will be placed into folders to minimise clutter.

All core book content is always available from the  Compendium Packs tab while this module is loaded regardless of what is imported into the world.

dcc-core-book.dcc-core-creatures: Cyclopedia of Creatures Monstrous and Mundane
dcc-core-book.dcc-core-creatures-journals: Cyclopedia of Creatures Monstrous and Mundane
